Package publicTransport

Class PublicTransportation

Object
PublicTransportation
Direct Known Subclasses:
AirCraft, CityBus, Ferry
public class PublicTransportation
extends Object
This is the PublicTransportation class which is the superclass of the AirCraft, Ferry and CityBus classes. It is also the grandparent class of the Metro and Tram classes.
Author:
Matthew Pan 40135588
